quests.title: The Whispering Woods
quests.description: Investigate the strange occurrences in the northern forest. Villagers report hearing whispers and seeing strange lights at night.
quests.reward: 500 gold and the gratitude of Riverdale

notes.content: Spoke with the mayor about the forest disturbances. He mentioned that the incidents started about a month ago, shortly after a traveling merchant passed through town.
Interviewed three villagers who claimed to have seen the lights. Each described them as pale blue orbs that seem to follow a pattern. Could be will-o'-wisps or some form of fey magic.

quests.title: The Lost Relic of Sarenrae
quests.description: A sacred relic was stolen from the temple vault. The relic is said to have healing properties and must be recovered before it falls into the wrong hands.
quests.reward: Blessing of Sarenrae and access to temple resources

notes.content: Ezren showed us the vault where the relic was kept. No signs of forced entry, suggesting an inside job or someone with knowledge of the temple's security.

quests.title: The Dragon's Hoard
quests.description: The red dragon Karasoth has been raiding villages in the northern mountains. Find his lair and recover the stolen treasures.
quests.reward: 30% of the recovered treasure and a commendation from the city

notes.content: Found tracks leading to a cave system in the mountains. Large claw marks on nearby trees suggest we're on the right path.

Defeated Karasoth after a difficult battle. Found a large cache of treasure including gold, jewels, and several magical items. Also discovered a map that might lead to another dragon's lair to the east.
